strapiPost.title: Latest Famous Hardware Co. Exhibition Features Local Fashion Designers
strapiPost.content:
The newest art installation behind the windows of the Famous Hardware building in Downtown Springdale is ready for you to view.

  • A look at Fashion Week: The installation is the first of the year and features clothing that was presented in the 2022 Northwest Arkansas Fashion Week. Aptly named “After the Runway,” the storefront exhibition pulls looks from both local and international designers. 
  • For the community: After the Runway can be seen from the sidewalk in front of the Famous Hardware building 24/7 at 113 and 115 West Emma Ave. through mid-May with each installation piece explained in English, Spanish, and Marshallese. 

Learn more HERE.
